projectOverview: This is a Spring Boot web application for a film rental store management system based on the Sakila database model. The application provides three user tiers - visitors can browse films and actors, customers can rent films and view their rental history, while owners have full administrative control to manage inventory, customers, and film details. Key features include film/actor browsing with search capabilities, customer authentication, rental processing, and an owner dashboard for managing the rental business with full CRUD operations on films and customer data.
